# init(type:)

**Initializer**

Creates a Home Screen quick action icon using a system-defined image.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(type: UIApplicationShortcutIcon.IconType)
```

## Parameters

- **type**: The system-defined image to use for the icon. For a list of possible images, see the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationShortcutIcon/IconType] enumeration.

## Return Value

A Home Screen quick action icon initialized with the specified system image.

## Discussion

Use this method to create icons for actions supported by the system. Users expect system-defined action images to be used only for the intended action.

## Creating a quick action icon

- **init(templateImageName:)**: Creates a Home Screen quick action icon based on an image in your app’s bundle, preferably in an asset catalog.
- **init(systemImageName:)**: Creates a Home Screen quick action icon using a system symbol image.
- **init(contact:)**: Creates a Home Screen quick action icon from the picture for a contact or a monogram of the contact name if the picture is unavailable.
